notifications.*.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

design.draft.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

design.draft.minimum.description: The minimum draft of the vessel

design.draft.maximum.description: The maximum draft of the vessel

design.draft.canoe.description: The draft of the vessel without protrusions such as keel, centerboard, rudder

design.length.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

design.keel.angle.description: A number indicating at which angle the keel currently is (in case of a canting keel), negative to port.

design.keel.lift.description: In the case of a lifting keel, centreboard or daggerboard, the part of the keel which is extended. 0 is 'all the way up' and 1 is 'all the way down'. 0.8 would be 80% down.

design.keel.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

design.rigging.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.lights.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.activeRoute.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.activeRoute.bearingActual.description: The current bearing of the next waypoint relative to true North

navigation.activeRoute.distanceActual.description: The current distance to the next waypoint

navigation.activeRoute.bearingDirect.description: The bearing relative to true North from last waypoint to the next waypoint

navigation.activeRoute.courseRequired.description: The course relative to true North towards the next waypoint

navigation.activeRoute.eta.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.activeRoute.startTime.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.activeRoute.waypoint.lastTime.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.activeRoute.waypoint.nextEta..description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.magneticVariation.description: The magnetic variation (declination) at the current position

navigation.destination.eta.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.destination.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.gnss.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.headingMagnetic.description: Current magnetic heading of the vessels

navigation.headingTrue.description: The current true heading of the vessel

navigation.attitude.allOf.1.roll.description: Vessel roll, +ve is list to starboard

navigation.attitude.allOf.1.yaw.description: Yaw, +ve is heading change to starboard

navigation.state.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.anchor.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.anchor.maxRadius.description: Radius of anchor alarm boundary. The distance from anchor to the center of the boat

electrical.batteries.*.allOf.1.voltage.a.description: Upper fault limit of battery voltage - BMS may disconnect battery
Lower fault limit of battery voltage - BMS may disconnect battery

electrical.batteries.*.allOf.1.current.a.description: Upper fault limit of battery current - BMS may disconnect battery
Lower fault limit of battery current - BMS may disconnect battery

electrical.batteries.*.allOf.1.temperatu.description: Upper fault limit of temperature - device may disable
Lower fault limit of temperature - device may disable

electrical.batteries.*.allOf.2.meta.allO.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

electrical.batteries.*.allOf.2.temperatu.description: Operational minimum temperature limit for battery discharge, in degrees Celsius
Operational maximum temperature limit for battery discharge, in degrees Celsius
Operational minimum temperature limit for battery recharging, in degrees Celsius
Operational maximum temperature limit for battery recharging, in degrees Celsius

electrical.batteries.*.allOf.2.capacity..description: The capacity of battery as specified by the manufacturer
The measured capacity of battery. This may change over time and will likely deviate from the nominal capacity.
Minimum capacity to be left in the battery while discharging
Cumulative discharge since battery was last full
Time to discharge to discharge limit at current rate

electrical.batteries.*.allOf.2.lifetimeD.description: Cumulative charge discharged from battery over operational lifetime of battery

electrical.batteries.*.allOf.2.lifetimeR.description: Cumulative charge recharged into battery over operational lifetime of battery

electrical.inverters.*.meta.dateInstalle.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

electrical.inverters.*.dc.voltage.allOf..description: Upper fault limit of battery voltage - BMS may disconnect battery
Lower fault limit of battery voltage - BMS may disconnect battery

electrical.inverters.*.dc.current.allOf..description: Upper fault limit of battery current - BMS may disconnect battery
Lower fault limit of battery current - BMS may disconnect battery

electrical.inverters.*.dc.temperature.al.description: Upper fault limit of temperature - device may disable
Lower fault limit of temperature - device may disable

electrical.inverters.*.ac.lineNeutralVol.description: RMS voltage measured between phase and neutral.

electrical.inverters.*.mode.timestamp.$r.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

electrical.chargers.*.allOf.0.voltage.al.description: Upper fault limit of battery voltage - BMS may disconnect battery
Lower fault limit of battery voltage - BMS may disconnect battery

electrical.chargers.*.allOf.0.current.al.description: Upper fault limit of battery current - BMS may disconnect battery
Lower fault limit of battery current - BMS may disconnect battery

electrical.chargers.*.allOf.0.temperatur.description: Upper fault limit of temperature - device may disable
Lower fault limit of temperature - device may disable

electrical.chargers.*.allOf.1.meta.allOf.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

electrical.chargers.*.allOf.1.mode.times.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

electrical.ac.*.meta.dateInstalled.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

electrical.ac.*.phase.*.lineNeutralVolta.description: RMS voltage measured between phase and neutral.

environment.air.outside.apparentWindChil.description: Current outside apparent wind chill temperature

environment.air.outside.theoreticalWindC.description: Current outside theoretical wind chill temperature

environment.depth.transducerToKeel.description: Depth from the transducer to the bottom of the keel

environment.depth.surfaceToTransducer.description: Depth transducer is below the water

environment.current.allOf.1.drift.description: The speed component of the water current vector

environment.current.allOf.1.setTrue.description: The direction component of the water current vector referenced to true (geographic) north

environment.current.allOf.1.setMagnetic.description: The direction component of the water current vector referenced to magnetic north

environment.tide.timeLow.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

environment.tide.timeHigh.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

environment.heave.description: Vertical movement of the vessel due to waves

environment.wind.angleApparent.description: Apparent wind angle, negative to port

environment.wind.angleTrueGround.description: True wind angle based on speed over ground, negative to port

environment.wind.angleTrueWater.description: True wind angle based on speed through water, negative to port

environment.wind.directionChangeAlarm.description: The angle the wind needs to shift to raise an alarm

environment.wind.directionTrue.description: The wind direction relative to true north

environment.wind.directionMagnetic.description: The wind direction relative to magnetic north

environment.wind.speedTrue.description: Wind speed over water (as calculated from speedApparent and vessel's speed through water)

environment.wind.speedOverGround.description: Wind speed over ground (as calculated from speedApparent and vessel's speed over ground)

environment.time.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

environment.mode.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

performance.polarSpeed.description: The current polar speed based on current polar diagram, trueWindSpeed and truewindAngle.

performance.polarSpeedRatio.description: The ratio of current speed through water to the polar speed.

performance.velocityMadeGood.description: The current velocity made good derived from the speed through water and appearant wind angle. A positive value is heading to upwind, negative to downwind.

performance.velocityMadeGoodToWaypoint.description: The current velocity made good to the next waypoint derived from the speedOverGround, courseOverGround.

performance.beatAngle.description: The true wind beat angle for the best velocity made good based on current current polar diagram and trueWindSpeed.

performance.beatAngleVelocityMadeGood.description: The velocity made good for the beat angle.

performance.beatAngleTargetSpeed.description: The target speed for the beat angle.

performance.gybeAngle.description: The true wind gybe angle for the best velocity made good downwind based on current polar diagram and trueWindSpeed.

performance.gybeAngleVelocityMadeGood.description: The velocity made good for the gybe angle

performance.gybeAngleTargetSpeed.description: The target speed for the gybe angle.

performance.targetAngle.description: The true wind gybe or beat angle for the best velocity made good downwind or upwind based on current polar diagram and trueWindSpeed.

performance.targetSpeed.description: The target speed for the beat angle or gybe angle, which ever is applicable.

propulsion.*.transmission.gearRatio.description: Gear ratio, Engine rotations per propeller shaft rotation

propulsion.*.drive.thrustAngle.description: Current thrust angle for steerable drives, +ve is thrust to Starboard

propulsion.*.drive.propeller.pitch.description: Current pitch of propeller, the distance the propeller ideally would advance during one revolution of the propeller

propulsion.*.drive.propeller.slip.description: Propeller slip, the ratio between propeller pitch and actual distance travelled

propulsion.*.fuel.used.description: Used fuel since last reset. Resetting is at user discretion

resources.charts.*.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

resources.routes.*.distance.description: Total distance from start to end

resources.routes.*.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

resources.notes.*.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

resources.regions.*.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

sails.inventory.*.area.description: The total area of this sail in square meters

sails.inventory.*.minimumWind.description: The minimum wind speed this sail can be used with

sails.inventory.*.maximumWind.description: The maximum wind speed this sail can be used with

sails.area.total.description: The total area of all sails on the vessel

sails.area.active.description: The total area of the sails currently in use on the vessel

steering.rudderAngle.description: Current rudder angle, +ve is rudder to Starboard

steering.rudderAngleTarget.description: The angle the rudder should move to, +ve is rudder to Starboard

steering.autopilot.state.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

steering.autopilot.mode.timestamp.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

steering.autopilot.targetHeadingNorth.description: Target heading for autopilot, relative to true North

steering.autopilot.targetHeadingMagnetic.description: Target heading for autopilot, relative to magnetic North

steering.autopilot.headingSource.timesta.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

steering.autopilot.deadZone.description: Dead zone to ignore for rudder corrections

steering.autopilot.backlash.description: Slack in the rudder drive mechanism

steering.autopilot.maxDriveCurrent.description: Maximum current to use to drive servo

steering.autopilot.portLock.description: Position of servo on port lock

steering.autopilot.starboardLock.description: Position of servo on starboard lock
